text: There are two parts. I want people to be encouraged by this book, not to give up, not to continue fight, because as you know, now in the world, there are more and more authoritarian regimes. And Alexey is a great example that people never give up, even in prison, even in torturing conditions. They continue, they are fight, even fight, because he was fighting even from prison. But also, of course, people will know my husband that he was a great man, that he was very kind, very funny, and very beloved person.
